review: My mother recently underwent a hysterectomy at PSRI Hospital performed by Dr. Birbala Rai and her team. Dr. Rai displayed both exceptional care and professionalism throughout the entire process. She not only provided us with clear and accurate medical guidance, but also prioritized my mother's comfort. The follow-up care was equally reassuring, with Dr. Rai ensuring my mother's recovery remained on track. Dr. Rai's kind demeanor and expertise make her a doctor I highly recommend.
Dr birbala rai I recommend this doctor to others regarding the gayne problem. Explanation was good I definitely recommend this doctor
